name: Premium Savings Account
description: Our Premium Savings Account offers competitive interest rates that grow with your balance. Enjoy no monthly fees with a minimum balance of $1,500, free online and mobile banking, and unlimited deposits. Perfect for building your emergency fund or saving for future goals.

name: Everyday Checking Account
description: Our Everyday Checking Account provides all the essentials with no minimum balance requirements. Features include a free debit card, access to over 40,000 ATMs nationwide, mobile check deposits, and bill pay services. Direct deposit available for faster access to your funds.

name: Cash Rewards Credit Card
description: Earn unlimited 1.5% cash back on all purchases with our Cash Rewards Credit Card. No annual fee, 0% intro APR on purchases and balance transfers for 15 months, and enhanced security features including instant purchase alerts and card lock/unlock from your mobile app.

name: Personal Loan
description: Our Personal Loans offer flexible financing for major expenses, debt consolidation, or unexpected costs. Competitive fixed rates starting at 5.99% APR, loan amounts from $2,000 to $50,000, and repayment terms from 12 to 60 months. No collateral required and no prepayment penalties.

name: Fixed-Rate Mortgage
description: Lock in a competitive rate for the life of your loan with our Fixed-Rate Mortgage. Available in 15, 20, and 30-year terms with as little as 3% down payment for qualified buyers. Our streamlined application process and dedicated mortgage consultants help make homeownership achievable.
